person.persName: John H. McBrayer (Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff)

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff. Kentucky native. Married Sarah Chambers McBrayer. Postmaster of Lawrenceburg, Kentucky, from 1848 to 1850. Farmer in Anderson County in 1860 and 1863. Sheriff of Anderson County in 1862.
